subject: Re: Bruce
author: Lyn
full_text:
Bruce,
I did send you a private reply the other day.
I know it was a long story, but hopefully you recieved it ok.

and I did post on group again.
am hoping someone will listen to the evps in the files
and tell me what they think.
the last one is what worried me, so we have done no more.

but I am still full  of questions :)

Lyn
